law.catch_line: Causing a suicide -- Assisting in a suicide.

text.section: A person commits a Class C felony when the person knowingly by force or duress causes another person to commit or to attempt to commit suicide.

A person commits a Class D felony when the person, with the purpose of assisting another person to commit or to attempt to commit suicide, knowingly and intentionally either:
Provides the physical means by which another person commits or attempts to commit suicide; or
Participates in a physical act by which another person commits or attempts to commit suicide.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 269, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.
